item.title: Ellie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Ellie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Ellie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Ellie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Chris Boucher
item.description: "Fourth Doctor: You know, the very powerful and the very stupid have one thing in common: they don't alter their views to fit the facts; they alter the facts to fit their views." -- Chris Boucher

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Just because you can doesn't mean you should." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I'm the top of the food chain and well...you're the food." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I am the god Apostolos. The Harbinger of Telikos. The Final Fate of all. Beloved son of Apollymi the Great Destroyer. My will makes the will of the universe. [Apostolos / Acheron Parthenopaeus] " -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Old enough to know better, pissed enough not to care. (Jaden)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "In your past lies your future. [Acheron Parthenopaeus]" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "People with weaknesses get killed by the people who lack them. Notice I'm not dead." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Law of the jungle. The betrayee gets to eat the betrayer. --Dante Pontis " -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I learned the bad guys are not always bad, the good guys are not always good, and to quote Captain Barbossa, the parameters are like rules, mostly guidelines. And that it takes a little bit of bad boy to fight the evil in the world. --Terri Mitchell" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Over, under, around, or through. There is always a way. - Soteria" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I wasn't born, I was unleashed." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "The strongest steel is forged by the fires of hell. (Savitar)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "I'm loved by some, hated by many, envied by most, yet wanted by all. (Josiah)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description:
"Relax. You're in good hands. Tabby wont hurt you.
She stabbed me!
Damn! I told her not to stab any more Hunters. I hate it when she does that." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description:
"Oh God, I just kissed a vampire!"
Oh Gods, I just kissed a human!" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Sometimes things have to go wrong in order to go right." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "With my background and genetic makeup,buddy, you're lucky I'm as normal as I am. (Katra Agrotera)" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Kat laughed. 'Who wants to live forever?' Kish put his hand up. 'For the record, I do.' Sin scowled at him. 'Then why do you irritate me so often?' Suicidal tendencies are inherent in my species?" -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "We almost made it to thirty seconds without an insult. I think we set a new record." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Ellie add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Any game plan? Xypher asked Sin. Don't die. I like it. Simple, bold. Impossible. Works for me. Kat scoffed at his sarcasm. What are you bitching about, Xypher? You're already dead. He laughed. You know, for once, it's good to be me." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon
